channel.title: [508] NPC'S, NPC Drops , Hamachi [508]
channel.description:
I have some more questions..
I want to add NPC's but I dont know how..
How can i change the 126 cb to 138 with summoning lvl?
And Does any one has a NPC Droplist?
I want to have my server work on hamachi cause no-ip. doesnt work.. But i dont know how.. i never did a server on hamachi any one help?

item.title: [508] NPC'S, NPC Drops , Hamachi [508]
item.dc:creator: @Meryntje Meryntje
item.description:
@Meryntje wrote:

[quote=“Mubbly, post:1, topic:277870”]Ok, then just download Hamachi from google and
start a new network with your server IP. Others will
need Hamachi to and join your network to come online[/quote]

and where do i need to put the ip in server?

Read full topic

item.title: [508] NPC'S, NPC Drops , Hamachi [508]
item.dc:creator: @Meryntje Meryntje
item.description:
@Meryntje wrote:

[quote=“Mubbly, post:1, topic:277858”][quote]I want to have my server work on hamachi cause no-ip. doesnt work…
But i dont know how… i never did a server on hamachi any one help?[/quote]

No-IP does work, just make one and others will
connect with it, yourself will connect with Localhost
or 127.0.0.0[/quote]
I cant do the portforward thing… so no it doesnt work with me.

Read full topic
